#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
	{
		long long sum[1024]={0},car[1024]={0},bit[102]={0},i,x,y,j,a[103],next[1024]={0},ncar[1024]={0};

		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			x=a[i];
			while(x)
			{
				bit[i]|=(1<<(x%10));
				x=x/10;
			}

			//sum[bit[i]]=y;
			//car[bit[i]]=1;
		}



		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=1023;j++)
			{
				if((j&bit[i])==0)
				{
					if(next[j+bit[i]]<a[i]+sum[j])
					{
						next[j+bit[i]]=a[i]+sum[j];
						ncar[j+bit[i]]=car[j]+1;
					}
					else if(next[j+bit[i]]==a[i]+sum[j])
					ncar[j+bit[i]]=max(ncar[j+bit[i]],car[j]+1);
				}

			}
			for(j=0;j<=1023;j++)
            {
                car[j]=ncar[j];
                sum[j]=next[j];
            }

		}

		long long anssum=0,anscar=0;
		for(i=1;i<=1023;i++)
		{
			if(anssum<sum[i])
			anssum=sum[i],anscar=car[i];

			else if(anssum==sum[i])
			anscar=max(anscar,car[i]);
		}

		cout<<anscar<<endl;
	}


}
